law.catch_line: Nondiscrimination against provider in geographic coverage area.
law.text: A health insurer shall not discriminate against any provider who is located within the geographic coverage area of the health benefit plan and who is willing to meet the terms and conditions for participation established by the health insurer, including the Kentucky state Medicaid program and Medicaid partnerships.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 496, sec. 13, effective April 10, 1998.
